alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond Du Lac (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fond du Lac and northeastern Dodge Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Fond Du Lac, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac, North Fond Du Lac, Lomira, Theresa, Oakfield, Rosendale, Ashford, Lamartine, Byron, Brownsville, Kekoskee, Oak Center, Lagoda, and Knowles. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 149 and 163. Interstate 41 between mile markers 81 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
